title: Birth rates and death rates in selected countries

content.description: BIRTH RATES AND DEATH RATES IN SELECTED COUNTRIES
content.question: Country Birth Rate per 1,000 population Death Rate per 1,000 population Ethiopia 33 7 Germany 9 11 Bangladesh 19 5 Chile 14 6 Vietnam 16 7 Source: Population Reference Bureau Which of the following statements accurately explains the population dynamics of a country on the table shown?

choices.label: Ethiopia has a high youth dependency ratio.
Chile has a higher rate of emigration than other countries in the table.
Males in Chile have a longer life expectancy than males in Germany.
Germany has a negative rate of natural increase.
Bangladeshi citizens have access to high-quality health care.

content.answer: Germany has a negative rate of natural increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
